org.embulk.spi.json

Interface JsonNumber

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JsonValue
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonDouble, JsonLong

    public interface JsonNumber
extends JsonValue
    Represents a number in JSON.
    Since:
    0.10.42
    See Also:
    RFC 8259 - The JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) Data Interchange Format

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.embulk.spi.json.JsonValue

        JsonValue.EntityType

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BigDecimal bigDecimalValue()
      Returns this JSON number as a BigDecimal.
      BigInteger bigIntegerValue()
      Returns this JSON number as a BigInteger.
      BigInteger bigIntegerValueExact()
      Returns this JSON number as a BigInteger.
      byte byteValue()
      Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive byte.
      byte byteValueExact()
      Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive byte.
      double doubleValue()
      Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive double.
      float floatValue()
      Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive float.
      int intValue()
      Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive int.
      int intValueExact()
      Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive int.
      boolean isByteValue()
      Returns true if the JSON number is integral in the range of byte, [-27 to 27-1].
      boolean isIntegral()
      Returns true if this JSON number is integral.
      boolean isIntValue()
      Returns true if the JSON number is integral in the range of int, [-231 to 231-1].
      boolean isLongValue()
      Returns true if the JSON number is integral in the range of long, [-263 to 263-1].
      boolean isShortValue()
      Returns true if the JSON number is integral in the range of short, [-215 to 215-1].
      long longValue()
      Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive long.
      long longValueExact()
      Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive long.
      short shortValue()
      Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive short.
      short shortValueExact()
      Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive short.

      • byteValue

        byte byteValue()
        Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive byte.

        It may narrow down the number to byte as a Java primitive. Note that this conversion can lose information about the magnitude of this JSON number, precision, and range.

        Returns:
        the byte representation of this JSON number
        Since:
        0.10.42
        See Also:
        Java Language Specification - 5.1.3. Narrowing Primitive Conversion

      • byteValueExact

        byte byteValueExact()
        Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive byte.

        It throws ArithmeticException if the JSON number is out of the range of byte, or has a non-zero fractional part.

        Returns:
        the byte representation of this JSON number
        Throws:
        ArithmeticException - if the JSON number is out of the range of byte, or has a non-zero fractional part
        Since:
        0.10.42

      • shortValue

        short shortValue()
        Returns this JSON number as a Java primitive short.

        It may narrow down the number to short as a Java primitive. Note that this conversion can lose information about the magnitude of this JSON number, precision, and range.

        Returns:
        the short representation of this JSON number
        Since:
        0.10.42
        See Also:
        Java Language Specification - 5.1.3. Narrowing Primitive Conversion
